ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What is the matter with you that you do not speak?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: What is wrong with you that you do not speak?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: What is the matter with you, why do you not speak?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “What is the matter with you, that you do not say anything?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: What is the matter with you that you speak not"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What is the matter with you that you do not speak?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What ails you, that you speak not?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: What aileth you that ye speak not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: What is the matter with you that you do not speak?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: What aileth ye that ye speak not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: What is the matter with you that ye speak not (intelligently)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: What is the matter with you that you speak not?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What is the matter with you, that you do not speak'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: What is it with you, that you do not speak?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:92] He then said: What is wrong with you that you do not speak?’ — but [still] he received no response.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: When they did not answer him, he said: (What aileth you that ye speak not) why do you not answer me?
